beginner: Solidify foundational knowledge in Linear Algebra, Calculus, Probability, and Statistics
Strengthen understanding of basic machine learning algorithms (Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision Trees)
intermediate: Explore advanced machine learning techniques (SVM, Random Forests, Gradient Boosting)
Deepen knowledge in Deep Learning architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers)
Gain experience with Cloud Computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
advanced: Master MLOps practices (CI/CD, model deployment, monitoring)
Explore specialized areas like Reinforcement Learning, Natural Language Processing, Computer Vision
Develop expertise in distributed computing frameworks (Spark, Dask)

certifications.name: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty
certifications.description: Validates expertise in building, training, and deploying machine learning models on AWS.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Demonstrates expertise in designing, building, and managing AI solutions on Azure.

certifications.name: TensorFlow Developer Certificate
certifications.description: Validates proficiency in developing and deploying TensorFlow models.

projects.title: Real-time Object Detection and Tracking
projects.description: Build a system that can detect and track objects in real-time using a camera feed and deep learning models.

projects.title: Medical Image Segmentation
projects.description: Develop a model that can segment medical images (e.g., MRI, CT scans) to identify specific tissues or organs.

projects.title: Financial Time Series Forecasting
projects.description: Build a model that can predict future stock prices or other financial time series data.
